health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions about decentralization of the sewerage system in the county were held.
health_data_challenges: Inadequate and dilapidated existing infrastructure, increasing demand for sewerage services, and potential threats to residents and the environment were identified as challenges.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: 1. Construct and decentralize the sewerage system to all the Wards in the County.  2. Transfer sewerage systems management to Ward level.
health_evidence_base: Information about the existing sewerage system infrastructure and its challenges were used to inform the recommendations for decentralization and management transfer.
